metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17580 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
A heap-based buffer over-read exists in the function fast_edit_packet() inthe file send_packets.c of Tcpreplay v4.3.0 beta1. This can lead to Denialof Service (DoS) and potentially Information Exposure when the applicationattempts to process a crafted pcap file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-17580` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpreplay - 4.3.2-1build1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tcpreplay package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.3.2-1build1').
